means: （工厂等由于检修、待料等的）停工期

sentence.Network_cn: 生产线上停机时间从55%减到了26%。

sentence.Network_en: Downtime in Hollywood can cost a lot of money.
sentence.Network_cn: 在好莱坞停工会损失许多钱。

entry.tran: (机器或设备的)停工时间，停止运行时间
entry.def: In industry, downtime is the time during which machinery or equipment is not operating.

example.ex: On the production line, downtime has been reduced from 55% to 26%.
example.tran: 生产线上停机时间从 55% 减到了 26%。

entry.def: In computing, downtime is time when a computer is not working.
Downtime is time when people are not working.

example.ex: Downtime in Hollywood can cost a lot of money.
example.tran: 在好莱坞停工会损失许多钱。

means.word_mean: 1. a period of time when something (as a machine or factory) is not operating (especially as a result of malfunctions)

auth_sentence.content: Both are hard workers with little tolerance for downtime.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both are hard workers with little tolerance for downtime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both are hard workers with little tolerance for downtime.

auth_sentence.content: The antidote is some purposeful downtime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The antidote is some purposeful downtime.

auth_sentence.content: It's surprising how much downtime there is during a game-show taping.
